He may sit there silently,

His face has
magnetism to it.
I know another journalist,

This is another person

Does Savik Shuster have any other

for which I'm personally
grateful to him.

He introduced freedom

and showed our politicians'

This was vital.
Flash quiz!
Don't spook me.

Your favorite Russian city?
Moscow.

When was the last time

January of 2014.

Ritz-Carlton Hotel.
Five interviews.

When did you decide

When the Crimean

Why?

I couldn't. To me, Russia is

I can't go there, even though

I love Moscow.

I have lots of friends there.
I love Piter.

I have lots of friends

I love the Piter spirit.

Repents.

Best football club in the world

Real Madrid.

Lvov or Donetsk*?

How long would you
want to live?
What for?
To see what it's like.

I don't want war.

Without a doubt,

What an original

[Visiting VDUD']

I often meet with

Beautiful eyes,

Yeah, our politicians are shit.

This bonds us and
